description.brazilian: Encontrou um cristal de laser para Virgil.
description.english: Found a Laser Crystal for Virgil
description.french: Trouver un cristal de laser pour Virgil
description.german: Laserkristall für Virgil gefunden
description.italian: Hai trovato un cristallo laser per Virgil
description.spanish: Has encontrado un cristal del láser para Virgil

displayName.italian: Bottoms up! [fallback English string] Give Co

description.brazilian: Dê um presente ao Khan.
description.english: Give Khan a Gift
description.french: Donner un cadeau à Khan
description.german: Gib Khan ein Geschenk
description.italian: Dai un regalo a Khan
description.spanish: Hazle un regalo a Khan

description.brazilian: Dê medicamentos aos gêmeos.
description.english: Give the Twins some Medicine
description.french: Donner des médicaments aux jumeaux
description.german: Gib den Zwillingen Medizin
description.italian: Dai ai gemelli delle medicine
description.spanish: Dales medicina a los gemelos

description.brazilian: Dê pó de cogumelo para Virgil.
description.english: Give Vigil the Mushroom Powder
description.french: Donner les champignons en poudre à Virgil
description.german: Gib Virgil das Pilzpulver
description.italian: Dai la polvere di funghi a Virgil
description.spanish: Dale el polvo de setas a Virgil

description.brazilian: Dê uma garrafa de uísque para Cox.
description.english: Give Cox the Bottle of Scotch
description.french: Donner la bouteille de whisky à Cox
description.german: Gib Cox die Flasche Scotch
description.italian: Dai la bottiglia di scotch a Cox
description.spanish: Dale la botella de whisky a Cox

description.brazilian: Ouça a música de Maya.
description.english: Listen to Maya’s Music
description.french: Écouter la musique de Maya
description.german: Höre dir Mayas Musik an
description.italian: Ascolta la musica di Maya
description.spanish: Escucha la música de Maya

description.brazilian: Desvende a verdade sobre o passado de Virgil.
description.english: Discover the truth about Vigil's past
description.french: Découvrir la vérité sur le passé de Virgil
description.german: Finde die Wahrheit über Virgils Vergangenheit heraus
description.italian: Scopri la verità sul passato di Virgil
description.spanish: Descubre la verdad sobre el pasado de Virgil

description.brazilian: Passe pelos drones nas minas sem que eles peguem você.
description.english: Made it past the Drones in the Mines without being caught
description.french: Atteindre les mines sans se faire attraper par les drones
description.german: Schaffe es an den Drohnen in den Minen vorbei, ohne erwischt zu werden
description.italian: Hai superato i droni nelle miniere senza farti catturare
description.spanish: Sortea los drones de las minas sin que te pillen

description.brazilian: Rayen mata Arlen.
description.english: Rayen kills Arlen
description.french: Rayen tue Arlen
description.german: Rayen tötet Arlen
description.italian: Rayen uccide Arlen
description.spanish: Rayen mata a Arlen

description.brazilian: Ajude Virgil a superar a crise de pânico.
description.english: Help Virgil overcome his panic attack
description.french: Aider Virgil à surmonter sa crise d'angoisse
description.german: Hilf Virgil dabei, seine Panikattacke zu überstehen
description.italian: Aiuta Virgil a superare il suo attacco di panico
description.spanish: Ayuda a Virgil a superar su ataque de pánico

description.brazilian: Mantenha Maya viva.
description.english: Keep Maya alive
description.french: Garder Maya en vie
description.german: Halte Maya am Leben
description.italian: Maya rimane in vita
description.spanish: Mantén con vida a Maya

description.brazilian: Mantenha Khan vivo.
description.english: Keep Khan alive
description.french: Garder Khan en vie
description.german: Halte Khan am Leben
description.italian: Khan rimane in vita
description.spanish: Mantén con vida a Khan

description.brazilian: Mantenha Cox vivo.
description.english: Keep Cox alive
description.french: Garder Cox en vie
description.german: Halte Cox am Leben
description.italian: Cox rimane in vita
description.spanish: Mantén con vida a Cox

description.brazilian: Conclua todos os Episódios de The Expanse.
description.english: Complete all Episodes of The Expanse
description.french: Terminer tous les épisodes de The Expanse
description.german: Schließe alle Episoden von The Expanse ab
description.italian: Completa tutti gli episodi di The Expanse
description.spanish: Completa todos los episodios de The Expanse

description.brazilian: Encontre todos os itens de sucata do jogo.
description.english: Find all the Scavenge Items in the game
description.french: Trouver tous les objets récupérables du jeu
description.german: Finde alle Plünder-Gegenstände im Spiel
description.italian: Trova tutti gli oggetti raccoglibili nel gioco
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los objetos de saqueo del juego

description.brazilian: Encontre todos os registros de dados em todos os Episódios.
description.english: Find all Data Logs in all Episodes
description.french: Trouver tous les journaux de données de tous les épisodes
description.german: Finde alle Dateneinträge in allen Episoden
description.italian: Trova tutti i registri di dati in tutti gli episodi
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los informes de datos en todos los episodios

description.brazilian: Mantenha todos os possíveis tripulantes vivos
description.english: Keep All Possible Crewmates Alive
description.french: Garder un maximum de membres d'équipage en vie
description.german: Halte alle möglichen Crewmitglieder am Leben
description.italian: Tutti i membri dell'equipaggio possibili rimangono in vita
description.spanish: Mantén con vida a todos los tripulantes

description.brazilian: Jogue três movimentos do xadrez contra Arjun
description.english: Play three chess moves against Arjun
description.french: Effectuez trois manœuvres aux échecs contre Arjun.
description.german: Spiele drei Schachzüge gegen Arjun
description.italian: Fai tre mosse di scacchi contro Arjun
description.spanish: Haz tres jugadas de ajedrez contra Arjun

description.brazilian: Abra o cofre do secretário-geral
description.english: Open the Secretary-General's safe
description.french: Ouvrez le coffre du bureau du secrétaire général.
description.german: Öffne den Tresor des Generalsekretärs
description.italian: Apri la cassaforte del segretario generale
description.spanish: Abre la caja fuerte del secretario general

description.brazilian: Pratique meditação com a estátua de Buda
description.english: Practice meditation at the Buddha statue
description.french: Méditez auprès de la statue de Bouddha.
description.german: Meditiere bei der Buddha-Statue
description.italian: Pratica meditazione vicino alla statua del Buddha
description.spanish: Medita en la estatua de Buda

description.brazilian: Consiga votos para se opor à moção de Mendez na primeira tentativa
description.english: Get the votes to oppose Mendez’s motion on the first try
description.french: Obtenez les votes nécessaires pour contrer la proposition de Mendez du premier coup.
description.german: Erhalte die Stimmen, um Mendez’ Antrag beim ersten Versuch abzulehnen
description.italian: Ottieni i voti per opporti alla mozione di Mendez al primo tentativo
description.spanish: Consigue a la primera los votos para tumbar la moción de Mendez

description.brazilian: Conclua a história do Arcanjo
description.english: Complete the Archangel story
description.french: Terminez l'histoire d'Archangel.
description.german: Schließe die Archangel-Geschichte ab
description.italian: Completa la storia di Arcangelo
description.spanish: Completa la historia de Arcángel
